storyInfo: The construction of the ritual Arts Circle is almost complete. Magdelene's greenhouse is destroyed by the Sarkaz mercenaries, while the flower-loving garrison commander helplessly tells her of his impending transfer and hints that she must leave town immediately.

attributes.text: I'm a fortunate woman.
\nWhen my grandfather passed away in the sunlight that shone upon the greenhouse, with his favorite flowers in his hands, he had already arranged everything for me.
\nI was going to live the rest of my life as both of us had hoped: In this town. In this tiny little greenhouse.
That is, until they arrived.
I was incredibly fearful that my life would be ruined...
\nBut that Sarkaz gave the order, and so my job remained here in the greenhouse.
\nI am still the town's gardener.
It has been a week since the two 'Self-Salvation Corps' people arrived.
\nLikewise, it has been a week since I last saw the Sarkaz officer who would turn the soil for the daisies in town.

attributes.content: Good afternoon, Magdelene. Your flowers look just as beautiful as always.
attributes.name: Tired Citizen

attributes.content: Thanks, Henk. Have you seen Will? I'm looking for him.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: He ordered some flowers the first thing this morning, but he still hasn't come to pick them up even though it's afternoon already.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Will ordered flowers? Oh, they must be for Freda's birthday.
attributes.name: Tired Citizen

attributes.content: He ditched right around noon. Most likely, he left to prepare whatever surprise he has in store for Freda.
attributes.name: Tired Citizen

attributes.content: Don't worry. He'll remember once Freda gives him a scolding.
attributes.name: Tired Citizen

attributes.content: Everyone seem very exhausted.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: I've been hearing noises around the work site at night. Has no one been getting any proper rest?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: The devils are apparently trying to show off for somebody. They're working us to the bone like there's no tomorrow, but I haven't seen any bigwigs visiting, either.
attributes.name: Tired Citizen

attributes.content: You're really lucky that you were given a decent job and don't have to suffer like us.
attributes.name: Tired Citizen

attributes.content: I didn't expect us to finish building this in a month just by gritting our teeth a little. It's like a miracle!
attributes.name: Tired Citizen

attributes.content: I'm willing to bet that before, the Londinium lords would've hauled all this into their museums!
attributes.name: Tired Citizen

attributes.content: I thought you used to hate this job...
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Magdelene, the world has changed.
attributes.name: Tired Citizen

attributes.content: (You should try to get on the Sarkaz officer's good side, too. You have nothing to lose, pet.)
attributes.name: Tired Citizen

attributes.content: Thanks for the advice. I'll think it over.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.text: Henk's suggestions are always so sincere.
\nBut his idea has left me terrified.
At night, whenever I can't sleep, I'm kept awake by the noise coming from the square, as though there's an iron hammer striking my head repeatedly.
\nAnd occasionally, I'm jolted awake from my dreams by those strange rocks.
I can't help but to think back on the worries of those two Self-Salvation Corps people a week ago.
\nPerhaps the Sarkaz changed more than just the way we live.

attributes.content: Again?
attributes.name: Jittery Citizen

attributes.content: How come the cannonfire's sounding closer lately?
attributes.name: Jittery Citizen

attributes.content: I heard there's more than one group of folks who want to take over Brentwood. If they come to blows, it'll be a hot mess here again.
attributes.name: Jittery Citizen

attributes.content: What's wrong with the way things are now, with everyone getting along? I hope this isn't going to delay our work!
attributes.name: Jittery Citizen

attributes.content: Magdelene, finally!
attributes.name: Victorian Boy

attributes.content: That devil who keeps visiting you brought others to wreck your greenhouse!
attributes.name: Victorian Boy

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Are you done? I said it's impossible for those Victorians to be hiding here.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: That's not for you to say.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: This house is clearly useless, and it's only still standing because you insisted on keeping it around. Who knows what you might be hiding here?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Grr, we're all fighting to the death for His Highness, but thanks to you and how weak you are, we've been letting chance after chance go to waste!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Watch your tone, mercenary. I am still a member of the Royal Court and the commander here.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Relax. If I find any guerrillas hiding here, I'll off you immediately and apply to join the Royal Court on the achievement.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Now lose that pacifism of yours. I'm getting sick of it.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Their actions are a serious interruption to the Military Commission's plans for this place.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: If it wasn't for your setbacks on the front lines fueling their ferocity, the boss wouldn't be having us rush everything to finish our job so quick.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: So you might as well shut up.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: My greenhouse...!
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: No—
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: (Shhh—)
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: (Don't move. Just watch quietly.)
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Nnf... nnf—
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.text: The black soil buried all of them.
\nThe daisies, roses, bluebells...
\nTheir rhizomes were all mercilessly crushed under their feet.
\nThe new buds growing toward the sunlight, too.
Freda asked me to plant these seeds for the festival. She was really looking forward to it.
\nShe said it would be the biggest harvest festival in ten years.
\nAll of us were looking forward to it.
But now, the new buds are no more.

attributes.content: Relax, your fingers are bleeding.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Don't try to break free.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: (I'm saving your life, Gardener.)
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Let her come.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Better that she wants to fight. That way I can just kill her and finish this right here and now.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You're too soft on this town, 'Commander'.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Glaring won't kill me.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Ugh, what a drag.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Flowers mean nothing to this war.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Armories, explosives, incinerators. That's what you really need.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.text: The very last new buds here are crushed.
\nGrandfather, we won't have fresh flowers during next year's harvest festival... Not anymore...

attributes.content: Let me go.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: I'm calm.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Have you found what you were looking for?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Count yourself lucky that I didn't.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Then please leave.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I thought you'd have a bit more guts than those idiots at the work site.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Hmph, Victorians.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Don't move. Your fingers need bandaging.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: I couldn't stop them.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: I... had some setbacks on the front lines.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Soon, there will be another here to take over for me. He... He has other plans for the town.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: There's an opening in the cement construction about two hundred meters to the west of the town's entrance. The guerrillas nearby blew it open.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: They won't give this chance up, so we need to fix this opening by 5 AM tomorrow.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.text: What a weird Sarkaz.
\nWhy is he telling me this?

attributes.content: The roses can still be saved. You must find a way to plant these poor things again.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: If that opening piques your interest... take these roses and cut through our camp tonight. It's the safest route.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: If somebody stops you, tell them you're delivering an order for me.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Of course, I'd be very happy if you could stop by and put a rose in front of my tent.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Some things should never be ruined, Gardener.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: My name is not Gardener, Sarkaz. It's Magdelene.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Hm, then let us reintroduce ourselves. My name is Shovel.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Shovel?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Remember, Magdelene. Time waits for no one.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.text: 'What we are planting for the harvest festival represents hope.'
\nThat's what my grandfather taught me. The flowers that line the streets during the festival each year are entrusted with everyone's simple wish for a bountiful harvest.
\nThere is nowhere else that needs hope now more than Brentwood.
\nI can't leave.

attributes.content: His tent should be in this direction... I have to take the flowers there as soon as I can.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: What's that?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Magdelene!
attributes.name: Freda
Freda
attributes.content: Where are you going with those flowers past curfew?

attributes.name: Freda
attributes.content: That's the direction of the barracks you're going. Hurry up and leave!
I... It's fine. I just wanted to come outside for a walk.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Right, I heard from Henk that it's your birthday today. Happy birthday! Will ordered some flowers for you, but he never came for them.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: If you see Will, please remind him.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Freda?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Why aren't you saying anything?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Come with me. It's not safe here.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Huh... These flowers...
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Will left them here to mourn my father. I've been keeping the warehouse locked, only occasionally lending him the key when he wants a sip of alcohol.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: The cannons here, did Mr. West prepare them for the festival? How magnificent...
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: It's all my fault...
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Did something happen to him?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: He was stopped by the devils at the Sarkaz barracks just now.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: He came to me earlier than usual for some sort of surprise, but when he found out I was going to the barracks to report on our progress, and he said he'd escort me there...
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: But the Sarkaz shouldn't have any reason to stop Will... They've never done that before.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: I don't know... I'm scared. I didn't have it in me to say no when they asked to take Will in...
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: I've been following their every word. I gave them everything they asked for. Why did they want to take him?
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Why... Did I do something wrong...?
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Maybe they only had a few questions for him.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Look on the bright side. They still need him to work for them!
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Right... That bloody thing isn't completed just yet. I am sure they still need Will.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: I have to stay here at the barracks' entrance and wait for him.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.text: Freda smiles.
\nBut I'm not happy about this one bit.
\nI know I'm lying to her. I'm sure she knows that as well. However, this is all that we can do right now.
\nThese days, we all need that tiny shred of hope to poison our minds.
'Hope.'

attributes.content: Freda... Did you see that?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.text: There's a strange creature climbing on a house's beams.
\nI don't know if 'creature' is exactly the right word for it.
\nIt's staring at me with its black body.
\nThe terrifying being's feeble limbs are no longer attached to the beams.
Finally, it lands on the flowers used to mourn the mayor before it dissipates, turning into a drop of blood, and dyes the flower buds.

attributes.content: Was it... looking at us just now?
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.text: Yes. It was looking right at us.
